scripts.build: npm run build -w @todo-app/shared && npm run build -w @todo-app/frontend && npm run build -w @todo-app/backend
scripts.deploy:backend: cd infra && sam build && sam deploy
scripts.deploy:frontend: aws s3 sync packages/frontend/dist s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name todo-app-dev --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`FrontendBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text) --delete
